functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Light","color":"white","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 0","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Creates a source of light in the location of the caster","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Light",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Light",author:"Lightmaster Caelum",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"The man revealed his magic, creating a small light for us so we could see in those cavernous depths. Thanks to him, we were able to make camp that night.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Lyt!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Light!)"}]']}

{display:{Name:'{"text":"Bubble Spray","color":"aqua","bold":true,"italic":true}',Lore:['{"text":"Tier 0","color":"light_purple","bold":true}','{"text":"Creates a spray of bubbles that slow foes down.","color":"dark_purple","italic":true}']},HideFlags:1,SpellBook:1b,Uses:-1,spellData:{Spell:"Bubble Spray",Ritual:0b,MaxUses:-1,LimitedUse:0b},Enchantments:[{}],title:"Bubble Spray",author:"Watermaster Sey",generation:3,resolved:1b,pages:['{"text":"Cast!","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true,"clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/trigger cast_spell set 1"}}','{"text":"\\"When the man finished his spell, a stream of bubbles streamed forth from his palm, and when it finally stopped, he was gone.\\"","color":"gold","italic":true}','[{"text":"\\"Com, bahls ouf aquae!\\"","color":"gold","bold":true,"italic":true},{"text":"\\n\\n(Come, balls of water!)"}]']}
